(Alternatively, you can chop very finely, then mash to a paste using the side of your knife.) Add brown sugar, oil, fish sauce, and soy sauce and mix well.How would you rate Universal Marinade?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (2)Back to TopTriangleHow long do you recommend meat sitting in marinade?
